attributes.action: get Westworld released on Region 2 DVD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For some reason you can buy The Making of Westworld but not the film itself on DVD! This is a bit rubbish and Im sure Tony agrees. He looks like a Yul Brynner fan. Get on it - and make sure it gets done before that Gordon comes into power cus i know he will just rush it through with no special features.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
